transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Haan ji madam.

Customer: Hello. Haan ji sir, good afternoon, kaise hain aap?

Executive: Haan ji sir, good afternoon.

Customer: Ji boliye.

Executive: Mujhe aapko ground nut ki lead bheji thi ground nut seeds.

Customer: Ji ji ji.

Executive: Ji to wo abhi aapke relevant hai matlab aapke jo quantity hai, location hai wo aapko sahi hai, suitable hai?

Customer: Wo bade bhaiya aaj bahar gaye hain dekhta hu main na wo aate hi.

Executive: Nahi maine aapke whatsapp pe bheja tha aap revert to.

Customer: Haan dekha hai mere main main mere wale system mein khulta nahi hai wo.

Executive: Aapke system mein nahi khulta hai aap phone pe nahi use karte hain kya?

Customer: Mobile phone pe?
Executive: Mobile mobile hai.

Customer: Phone pe?

Executive: IndiaMART ka mobile app hai.

Customer: Ji ji.

Customer: Karte hain na usme wo kholte hain usme paisa lagta hai.

Executive: Paisa lagta hai? Nahi usko paisa nahi lagta hai.

Customer: Lead lead lead lead open karte hi ye apne pin code ka wo aa jata hai usme option.

Executive: Nahi nahi aap agar mobile app jaise system pe use karte hain na waise hi mobile pe bhi use kar sakte hain koi paisa charge nahi lagta hai ek bhi.

Customer: Kar to sakte hain uske liye usi bastaram sir ki OTP chahiyegi apne ko.

Executive: Haan to satram sir se OTP le lijiye.

Customer: Haan aa aa aa aaj main baat karta hu unse OTP leta hu main.

Executive: Haan haan ek baar aap unse baat kar lijiye aur ek baar mujhe call back kar dijiye.

Customer: Thodi der mein main call back karwata hu aapko na.

Executive: Ji ji ji. Kitne der mein call back karwayenge aap?

Customer: Shaam tak karwaunga main aapko na.

Executive: Accha shaam ko karayenge kyunki na kal aapke customer care pe call kar diya tha.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Ji to hume wo bhi close karna hoga na aap mera number save kar lijiye na khud pe call kar liya kariye.

Customer: Konse wale number hai aapke aap usme mare ko hi likh ke bhej dijiye.

Executive: Whatsapp pe main jo message karti hu aapke is number pe.

Customer: Ji ji wo aapke number hai kya personal?

Executive: Wo mera personal number hai aap mujhe usi pe call kiya kariye.

Customer: Ji ji ji ji.

Executive: Ji ji main ye customer care wala concept close kar du?

Customer: Close kar do.

Executive: Ji ji thank you so much sir main ye concept close kar deti hu aap mere personal number pe mujhe call kar lijiye.

Customer: Ji ji ji jab bhi jab bhi issue ho theek hai ground nut seeds wala ek baar mujhe send please dekh kar ke bata dijiyega fir main aur bhi kuch karungi na isliye main.

Executive: Okay.

Executive: Theek hai ji sir. Aur koi help chahiye?

Customer: Nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to open leads on system.

- Customer says opening leads costs money.

- Customer needs OTP from Bastaram sir.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified mobile app usage is free.

- Executive asked customer to get OTP.

- Executive offered personal number for direct contact.

- Executive will close customer care ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back by evening.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, mobile app, otp, personal number
